cis.monopoly.gamePlay

Class CommunityChestCard

  • java.lang.Object
    • cis.monopoly.gamePlay.Card
      • cis.monopoly.gamePlay.CommunityChestCard

  • public class CommunityChestCard
extends Card

    CommunityChestCard

    This class is used to define the Community Chest cards. These cards either give or take money from the player. This is represented by the boolean "getMoney."

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      CommunityChestCard()
      Default CommunityChestCard constructor.
      CommunityChestCard(int iD, java.lang.String text, boolean getMoney, int cardAmount)
      The constructor that is used for card creation.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void applyCondition(Player player)
      Applies the card condition to the player who has received the community chest card.
      int getCardAmount()
      Gets the amount listed on the card.
      boolean isGetMoney()
      Used for seeing whether player gets or receives money from the bank.

    • Constructor Detail

      • CommunityChestCard

        public CommunityChestCard()
        Default CommunityChestCard constructor.

      • CommunityChestCard

        public CommunityChestCard(int iD,
                          java.lang.String text,
                          boolean getMoney,
                          int cardAmount)
        The constructor that is used for card creation.
        Parameters:
        iD - The ID for the community chest card.
        text - The text that will be displayed on the card
        getMoney - Determines whether the player pays or not.
        cardAmount - The amount of money given/recieved.

    • Method Detail

      • isGetMoney

        public boolean isGetMoney()
        Used for seeing whether player gets or receives money from the bank.
        Returns:
        True if they get money, false if they give money.

      • getCardAmount

        public int getCardAmount()
        Gets the amount listed on the card.
        Returns:
        The amount of money given/taken.

      • applyCondition

        public void applyCondition(Player player)
        Applies the card condition to the player who has received the community chest card.
        Parameters:
        player - The player who got the card.
